programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Stars Above

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions

programme.title: Gravity

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS, S05E10, Projects in the works. SunRISE, SPHEREx, NEOS and others, their mission to expand our knowledge of Earth, the surrounding space, Dark Matter, and the earliest galaxies. N

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Shore To Shore

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy, 20230101000000 +0000, 'Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy' is an hour-long tribute to the iconic series that shaped future generations of true crime TV, featuring interviews with the creators and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Sweethearts, Silenced
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E04, A killer authors a book about his con-man past that becomes the key to solving a 29-year-old cold case of two high school sweethearts--and three other cold case murders--leading police to believe he could be the Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Killer in the Storm
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E01, In the heart of Cajun country, young mother Brenda DuPont is found murdered in her home in May 1988. The initial investigation sputters and turns cold, but her sister Linda vows to solve her murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

So You Said Yes, 20150207000000 +0000, A woman who avoids relationships opens a vintage bridal shop, and goes head-to-head with the snobbish owner of the town's classical bridal shop-only to find out her rival is the mother of her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E09, Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: The Return (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E10, The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: The Return (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E11, O'Neill and Woolsey, the lone survivors of the replicators' bloody coup, hide out in an abandoned section of the city. Knowing Landry has an order to nuke Atlantis if a foothold situation should ever arise, the two lay low awaiting their fate.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: The Scourge
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E17, A crop of genetically engineered insects turns deadly, forcing the SG-1 team to destroy them before they and the visiting international diplomats becoming their next victims. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Arthur's Mantle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E18, While Teal'c sets off to investigate foul play on a Jaffa planet, Mitchell, Carter and Daniel become out of phase while experimenting with a powerful and ancient device. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Crusade
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E19, Vala returns to Stargate Command to deliver startling news: the Ori have been building military forces, and plan to launch crusades against their dissidents in the near future. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Camelot
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E20, As the Ori's all out assault. looms closer, lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell and Daniel Jackson race to locate a device that will obliterate the evil enemy once and for all. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Flesh And Blood
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E01, As their battle with the Ori continues, the team struggles to reunite and formulate a plan to defeat their enemy. Vala (Claudia Black), still aboard an Ori ship, watches as her newly born child quickly ages and is molded to lead the Ori army.

programme.title: Morpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E02, On a mission to find a weapon that will defeat their powerful foe, the team finds a planet whose inhabitants were killed by a mysterious illness, and unwittingly fall victim to the illness themselves. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: The Pegasus Project
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E03, SG-1 travels to the Pegasus Galaxy and the city of Atlantis in hopes to find a clue to a weapon that can destroy the Ori. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E04, The team makes a pact with an old enemy to fight their common foe, and the results are disastrous. Starring Ben Browder as Lt. Colonel Cameron Mitchell, Christopher Judge as Teal'c, and Amanda Tapping as Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E05, SG-1 struggles to control a rash of brutal attacks by an elusive and savage alien creature. Starring Ben Browder as Lt. Col. Mitchell, Amanda Tapping as Lt. Col. Carter, Christopher Judge as Teal'c, and Michael Shanks as Dr. Jackson.

Stargate SG-1, S10E06, A reluctant SG-1 assists Martin Lloyd (guest star Willie Garson) with his feature film script as a cover story to keep the Stargate Program secret. Also starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E014, The courts decide on a punishment for Steve, whose illegal rave resulted in the fire that almost took two lives.

programme.title: Christmas Comes This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E015, After reading Erica's plea for help, Dylan leaps into action and hires a private investigator to help him track down her kidnappers.

programme.title: Sentenced To Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E016, While working off his community service Steve meets a victim of Alzheimer's Disease, whose life story inspires Steve to make the most of his own.

programme.title: Sweating It Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E017, A motorcycle road trip inadvertently leads Brandon and Dylan to an ancient Native American ceremony where the two friends learn valuable lessons.

programme.title: Hazardous To Your Health
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E018, Dylan and Valerie fly to Mexico, where they hope to rescue Erica and reclaim Dylan's inheritance.

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E019, Kelly distances herself from everyone that matters to her as Finley's hold on her grows stronger.

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E021, Brandon seeks Dylan's help with both taking down Professor Finley's cult-like organization and reuniting with his girlfriend, but when it comes to Kelly all bets are off.

programme.title: Alone At The Top
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E022, As the new owner of the After Dark, Valerie uses her newfound leverage to force Ray to continue their affair. But Ray has never been one to follow orders.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E023, The campus is in an uproar when an alleged rapist is released from custody. Despite his alibi, the students are sure that Lenny is responsible for the string of crimes on campus.

programme.title: Unreal World
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E024, A documentary for a class project reveals intimate secrets about the gang and threatens to tear apart some long-standing couples. Meanwhile, Jesse makes a confession to Andrea.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E04, Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E06, Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E07, Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E08, Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E09, Matt Brody returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely when a group of ruthless pirates takes hostages. Meanwhile, Joey's past may jeopardize her adoption by Mitch.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E10, Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring, but things change when a baby is left in Logan’s possession. Meanwhile, Cody must overcome yet another setback to his Olympic career.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E11, Caroline blames herself for a teen's death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and goes through Critical Incident Stress. Pushing everyone away, Caroline begins partying to distract from her guilt. Can the team help her recover from her PTSD?

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E12, A mysterious, unseen creature begins attacking beachgoers, and it is up to the Baywatch team to find the creature. Meanwhile, Inside Sports Magazine wants a lifeguard for their swimsuit issue. Neely and Caroline compete for the cover.

programme.title: Desperate Encounter
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E13, Logan must help his friend Carmen raise $50,000 to keep her ranch, and Jessie Lee Harris is back in town just in time to help. Mitch finds himself in a deadly race for justice during his vacation in Baja, Mexico.

programme.title: Baywatch Angels
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E14, Stephanie, Caroline, and CJ become Charlie’s Angels in a fun fantasy romp through 70's television as they try and catch an escaped psychopath bent on killing lifeguards.

programme.title: Bash at the Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E15, CJ rescues pro wrestler Hulk Hogan, who then tells the Baywatch team that he's in town with Randy Savage to try and prevent the closure of the Venice Boys' Youth Center. Hogan must take on Ric Flair in a cage match to prevent the closure.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E16, Mitch is convinced by Stephanie's boyfriend Tom to go sky-surfing. Things go horribly wrong when Mitch's parachute fails to deploy! Back on the beach, CJ's lifeguarding duties are impeded when she begins dating a celebrity.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E17, Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta where they will compete against South Bay, and Neely is taking the competition very seriously. Meanwhile, Mitch finds out Joey has grandparents who want to care for her.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E18, Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia falling off the pier and must find her father to help her recover her memories. CJ meets a wheelchair-bound man who’s determined to get wheelchair access across the beach to the water.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E19, The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit. Logan becomes obsessed with competing in a surfing competition. To avoid a curse, CJ and Stephanie must return a sacred lava rock to its original location.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E20, After Matt is stung by a poisonous fish, he and Mitch find a village where a young woman offers to help them, resulting in all three of them running from her jealous suitor. Logan’s selfish behavior puts his relationship with Caroline in jeopardy.
